        public PostValidateMoveRoute(GameCenter gameCenter,
                             PlayerLobby playerLobby,
                             com.google.gson.Gson gson)
        Create the Spark Route (UI controller) for the POST /validateMove HTTP request.
        Parameters:
        gameCenter - the GameCenter for tracking all ongoing games
        playerLobby - the default PlayerLobby for tracking all players
        gson - The default Gson parser for handling Ajax responses
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - when the gameCenter, playerLobby, or templateEngine parameter is null
